message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $15,000 is too low for me. Could you do $16,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $15,750 for the product. This is my final offer.
